Articles.Content:
I apologize in advance, since I'm not sure if this is a bug or a simple reality of the game's design. I've recently switched over to a 4K monitor. While I have been able to scale most UI elements to a manageable size, I've found something very weird: the stock toolbar is scaled to a visible size in the space center and the VAB, but if you go onto the launchpad or a ship in orbit, it shrinks to tiny, unscaled sizes. 

When you return to the space center/VAB/etc., the toolbar remains tiny. My navball, stage buttons, etc., all scale fine (200%). Is there a way to fix this? 

Edited July 30, 2016 by Synthesis
OK, you just need to alter UI_SCALE_APPS apparently. Problem solved!
Sorry that nobody knew the answer -- glad you found it!
